title.narrative: Systems to Uphold the Credibility and Constitutionality of Elections in South Sudan (SUCCESS)

description.narrative: (South Sudan): SUCCESS provides technical assistance to civil society organizations (CSOs) to enable critical programming and consensus-building on key governance, peace, and conflict issues designed to increase citizen participation in political processes. FY 2020 funds will help build the institutional capacity of existing CSOs through instruction on sustainability, organizational management, and effective programming. Support will also help CSO coalitions to promote inclusive dialogue, advocacy, and civic education, national identity as well as continue citizen consultations on issues such as transitional justice and accountability, and promote a greater sense of national identity. This is done largely through holding of public events--that follow social distancing protocols, advocacy campaigns, and activities around the country. With the FY 2020 funds, SUCCESS will continue to promote the sustainability of six civic engagement centers by supporting User Committees to develop greater ownership and leadership of the centers.
